brief_title: AMG 162 in the Treatment of Bone Loss in Subjects Undergoing Androgen-Deprivation Therapy for Non-metastatic Prostate Cancer
brief_summary: This study will evaluate AMG 162 in the treatment of bone loss in subjects undergoing Androgen-Deprivation Therapy for Non-metastatic Prostate Cancer.
description: 60 mg (1.0mL) administered subcutaneously at Day 1, Months 6, 12, 18, 24, 30
60 mg (1.0mL) administered subcutaneously at Day 1, Months 6, 12, 18, 24, 30
keyword: Treatment of bone loss in patients undergoing androgen deprivation therapy (ADT) for non-metastatic prostate cancer (PC).
